com.canabang.genietext.core.model.structs
Class AddressSet

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.AbstractListModel
      javax.swing.DefaultListModel
          com.canabang.genietext.core.model.structs.AddressSet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, ListModel
public class AddressSet
extends DefaultListModel

Represents a set of email addresses. Supports serializing capabilities.

Version:
1.00 2009-05-31 Initial submission.
Author:
rhaq

Constructor Detail

AddressSet

public AddressSet(String outputPath)
           throws TransformerConfigurationException
Creates a blank set of addresses.

Parameters:
outputPath - The file to output the address entries to.
Throws:
TransformerConfigurationException - If an output XML file could not be properly configured and set up to output the subscription list.
Method Detail

addElement

public void addElement(String s)
Adds an address to this set if it doesn't already exist.

Parameters:
s - The address to add as a String.

addElements

public void addElements(Address[] addresses)
Adds the specified addresses to this set if they don't already exist.

Parameters:
addresses - The addresses to add.

backUp

public void backUp()
            throws SAXException,
                   IOException
Backs up the current set of addresses to the file system.

Throws:
SAXException - If there are any problems writing an output XML file.
IOException - If the output file cannot be opened to write.

partialMatch

public boolean partialMatch(Address a)
Determines if the specified address exists in the current set.

Parameters:
a - The address to check if it exists in this set or not.
Returns:
true if the address exists in the set, false otherwise.

partialMatch

public boolean partialMatch(Address[] addresses)
Determines if the specified addresses exist in the current set.

Parameters:
addresses - The addresses to check if they exist in this set or not.
Returns:
true If at least one of the addresses exist in this set, false otherwise.

removeElement

public boolean removeElement(String a)
Removes the specified address from this set if it exists.

Parameters:
a - The address to remove from this set.
Returns:
true If this set contained the specified address and was removed, false otherwise.

removeElements

public boolean removeElements(Address[] addresses)
Removes the specified addresses from this set if they exist.

Parameters:
addresses - The address to remove from this set.
Returns:
true If all the addresses were removed, false otherwise (if any of the addresses did not exist in this set).
